page.title: 05Yeovil Golf Club.
page.content: {The Golf Course is at the bottom of {Babylon Hill,near the river.}It's size is 6139 yards. There are 18 holes and 50 bunkers,49 on the main course and one on the training course. The par for the golf course is 65. It was built in 1923. It is open all day,everyday. To hire golf clubs costs Â£3. There are 659 members;453 men,147 women and 59 children. They are in separate groups as only 475 men are allowed each year. The youngest member is a boy of seven.{The annual {membership and green fee is;Juniors {Â£30,men Â£143 and women Â£105.}The members have won four trophies. There are charity competitions for Guide Dogs,Heart Foundation and others. All members own the club and appoint the board of directors. There are six county players. Golf is a popular form of recreation in the town.
